New Records: Keshav Maharaj defended 10 runs in the last over for the first time in a T20I.
Anrich Nortje was close to becoming the joint leading wicket-taker in the tournament.
South Africa achieved their highest fifth-wicket stand in T20Is at Eisenhower Park.
Key Match Events: Keshav Maharaj's last over where Bangladesh couldn't capitalize led to South Africa's win.
Mahmudullah was dropped by Marco Jansen, which could have changed the game's outcome.
Litton Das was gifted a wicket to David Miller.
Bangladesh needed 31 runs off 30 balls in the final over.
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa chose to bat first despite challenging conditions.
Bangladesh had a strong fan presence at the match.
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa secured a dominant win and moved closer to the Super Sixes.
Bangladesh's close but unsuccessful chase was noted.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on the same strip as the India-Pakistan game the previous day.
Bangladesh fans turned out in large numbers.
Others: David Miller's birthday was mentioned as a special day for South Africa.
Live updates and pre-match shows were highlighted during the match.
